snippet: South Korea’s nuclear watchdog is investigating a forgery scandal that is forcing the shutdown of two reactors, an official said Tuesday.
abstract: South Korea's Nuclear Safety and Security Commission is investigating possible forgery of certifications at five nuclear reactors, two of which have been asked to shut down; shutdowns raise fears of winter power shortages.
lead_paragraph: South Korea’s nuclear watchdog is investigating a forgery scandal that is forcing the shutdown of two reactors, an official said Tuesday.

headline.main: South Korea: Forgery Scandal Affects Reactors
